word:
We are nearing the judgment. Already the plagues of God are beginning to be poured out. Upon some parts of the world God is permitting the plagues to fall. If we would escape these plagues, we must be pure, virtuous, holy, ever remembering that we are God's property. Because He has redeemed us, He wants us to cleanse the soul-temple from every trace of pollution. He wants His people to be healthy Christians, physically and spiritually.--Ms 62, 1901, pp. 5, 6. (Sermon at the 1901 General Conference, typed July 9, 1901.) 

Released May 11, 1971
